Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Modern Intrusion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting, characters, and the central conflict surrounding Ghost Town, contrasting the old West with modern developments and the threat of an airport construction.

sub_scenes.title: Old West Refusals and Ghost Town Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the initial setting in the old West, introduces key characters, and hints at the central mystery of Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Modern Day Airport Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a flashback to Ghost Town's past and then transitions to the present day conflict of an airport being built there, creating a clash between history and modernity.

narrative_arcs.title: Modern Day Disruption: Airport Plans for Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Disillusionment and Construction Site Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores romantic notions clashing with reality and introduces the harsh environment of the construction site and its workers.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with Construction Workers and Disdain

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic and Familial Conflicts Amidst Airport Development
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to domestic and familial conflicts, particularly around Nan's relationship with her father and Cal, against the backdrop of the airport construction and cattle business.

sub_scenes.title: Cattle Business and Father-Daughter Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the practical aspects of cattle transport by air and the escalating tension between Nan and her father regarding the airport and her duties.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Comfort and Nan's Decision
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan receiving conflicting advice from family members about Cal, leading to her moment of doubt and a decision to seek clarity.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses to the Airport and the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Cal's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan's emotional confession to Cal and his somewhat detached response, followed by his departure, leaving Nan in reflection.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Shift and Impending Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts the narrative to a severe weather event, detailing its impact and the growing crisis affecting the community and their livestock.

narrative_arcs.title: Recollections of Changed Weather and Difficult Journey
Seeking Comfort and Reassurance Amidst Hardship
Recalling Past Winter's Severity and Impending Starvation
Riding Out to Face the Crisis and Uncertain Future

sub_scenes.title: Snowbound Restlessness and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the characters confined by the snow, their anxieties, and the unexpected arrival of aerial aid, bringing hope amidst the crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Restlessness and Persistent Snowfall
The Sound of Hope: Arrival of a Plane
Relief from the Sky and Reflections on Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Juniper Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character, Chane Benson, and shifts the setting to Juniper Town, focusing on themes of violence, hero worship, and journalistic integrity.

sub_scenes.title: Cowtown Showdown and Character Analysis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a violent act and explores initial reactions and judgments about his character and persona.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Parental Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene delves into Jeff's admiration for figures like Chane Benson and Clyde Surrett, and the concerns of Sally and his father about this hero worship and his fascination with guns.

narrative_arcs.title: Advice on Decency and Confrontation with Benson

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worries and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Sally's deep concerns about Jeff's behavior and her conversation with Clyde, seeking reassurance and guidance.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern Over Jeff's Gun Obsession and Control
Reassurance and Premonition of Finding Jeff
Clyde's Retrospective Account of Jeff's Disappearance
Introducing Mr. Benson and Casual Banter
Mr. Benson's Ominous Tone Shift and Mention of Death

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around Clyde's controversial article about Benson, Sally's angry reaction, and Benson's own justification and threats.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Justification for Writing About Benson
Sally's Distrust and Ominous Description of Benson
Benson's Threat to Clean Up Juniper Town

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Tense Encounters
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features accusations, flashbacks, and culminates in a dinner invitation to Chane Benson, setting up a tense and potentially deceptive social interaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback to Benson's Articles and Consequences
Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Sally's Persuasion and Jeff's Agreement to Invite Chane
Invitation to Dinner and Observation of Chane's Demeanor
Discussion on Chane's Artistic Skills and Character

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Deception and Violent Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the dinner with Chane Benson, marked by suspicion, jealousy, and ultimately erupting into violence and accusations.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Confrontation and Accusation of Trap
Sally's Accusation and Demand for Honesty
Sally's Angry Explanation to Jeff about Chane's Actions and Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Physical Altercation and Chase to Save Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the physical fight between Jeff and Chane, Sally's desperate reactions, and the urgent chase to prevent Chane from harming Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Angry Confrontation and Jeff's Punch
Sally's Desperate Plea and Jeff's Fall
Urgent Warning and Chase After Chane

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Newspaper Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the final confrontation with Benson, Chane's decisive intervention, and the resolution at the Clarion office, emphasizing journalistic integrity and community resilience.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Intrigue and Betsy's Agency
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Betsy and a new ranch setting, focusing on range war, character introductions, and Betsy's assertive role in managing her ranch and relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Power Dynamics and New Hire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes power dynamics on the Double Bar Ranch and introduces Steve Daley, setting up initial tensions and expectations.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Approbation of Steve Daley's Hiring

sub_scenes.title: Range War Warning and Town Journey
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the impending range war, Hank's concerns, and Betsy's journey into town with Steve, developing their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of Accommodation and Lingering Doubts
Journey into Town and Expressed Gratitude
Hank's Orders and Material for a Dress

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Near Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's activities in town, her confrontation with Fred Bridges, and the escalating tension leading to a potential gunfight.

sub_scenes.title: Gunslinger Decision and Father's Approval
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy's firm decision to hire a gunslinger, her justification to Hank and her father, and gaining approval for her assertive approach.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Firm Decision to Hire a Gunslinger
Justification and Acceptance from Authority Figure
Hank's Concern and Betsy's Softened Stance

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession and Commitment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks the romantic development between Betsy and Steve, featuring mutual confessions of love and promises of commitment in the face of ranch conflicts.

narrative_arcs.title: Sudden Intense Feelings and Mutual Confession

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Horse Theft
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Old Man Bridges' arrival, escalating tensions with ranch hands, and culminates in the discovery of horse theft, intensifying the range war conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Man Bridges' Arrival and Ranch Hands' Confrontation
Betsy's Warning and Steve's Determination Amidst Threats
Betsy's Assertion of Authority on Gun Use
Aftermath: Horse Theft and Realization of Loss

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy's emotional reaction to Steve's departure for Devil's Pass, her attempts to dissuade him, and her ultimate decision to follow him.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Arrival at Gunfire Scene

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Showdown and Romantic Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic scene at Devil's Pass, Betsy's intervention, and the subsequent romantic reunion and resolution with Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Fred, and Dave: Love Triangle and Ranch Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Carrie's story, focusing on a complex love triangle with Fred and Dave, set against the backdrop of ranching disputes, fence conflicts, and business negotiations.

sub_scenes.title: Personal Conflict and Ranch Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a personal conflict concerning Dave and another man, alongside emerging ranch concerns about Curley and outsiders.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Concerns about Curley and Outsiders

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Gunpoint Standoff
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the conflict over fencing, the unexpected arrival of Fred Gordon, and the escalating tension leading to a gunpoint confrontation with Curley.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies, Guilt, and Conflicted Feelings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores themes of apology and reconciliation, Carrie's guilt and conflicted feelings regarding Fred and Dave, and her internal reflections.

sub_scenes.title: Explanations, Truce, and Movie Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Carrie's explanations to Dave and Fred, leading to a tentative truce between the men and a proposal for a movie outing.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Resolution and Marriage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the romantic resolution of Carrie and Fred's relationship, with a marriage proposal and acceptance.

sub_scenes.title: Contract Concerns and Betrayal Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces concerns about the Carlton contract, Fred's justifications, and Carrie's angry accusation of betrayal towards Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Negotiation and Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the negotiation for the Carlton contract, Carrie's assertive stance, emotional aftermath, and ultimate business victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Assertion of Independence and Business Acumen

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Rejection and Lingering Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Carrie's angry declarations, dismissive encounters with Dave, and her eventual confession of love for Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Intuition and Long Ride Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Final Romantic Resolution and Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Carrie and Fred's romantic arc with confessions, realizations, and a passionate reconciliation culminating in a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Fred's Arrival and Misunderstanding
Carlton's Explanation of the Beef Contract
Realization of Foolishness and Seeking Reassurance
Affectionate Embrace and Plea for Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk, Chris, and Rance: Western Justice and Love Triangle Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Dirk and Chris's story, exploring themes of western justice, mistaken identity, pursuit, gunfights, and a complex love triangle culminating in a wedding and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Entry and Mistaken Identity Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's urgent situation, his entry into a bedroom, and the initial hint of mistaken identity and secrecy.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Dirk's Injury and Medical Examination

sub_scenes.title: Grandfather's Investigation and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the grandfather's concern and investigation, and introduces Marshal Rance Cready at the ranch, setting up a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Confrontation and Demand for Authority

sub_scenes.title: Murder Accusation and Temporary Truce
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the accusation against Dirk, the Ranch Owner's defense, and the establishment of a temporary truce due to Dirk's injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Law vs. Justice and Dirk's Injury

sub_scenes.title: Love Confession and Jealous Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Chris's confession of love to the Ranch Owner, her internal conflict, and Rance's jealous intervention, setting up a love triangle.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Understanding and Escape Plan

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk and Chris's escape attempt, the relentless pursuit by the Marshal, and their violent confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Choice and Dirk's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the moral dilemma of leaving the wounded Marshal, Dirk's farewell, and his escape to Mexico, highlighting the consequences of their actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Leaving the Wounded Marshal and Woman's Reflection
Dirk's Farewell and Escape to Mexico

sub_scenes.title: Chris's Return, Rance's Scorn, and Dirk's Escape Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris's surprising return to Rance, Rance's scornful reaction, and the confirmation of Dirk's successful escape, adding layers to their complex relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Return to Rance and Woman's Thoughts
Rance's Pursuit and Dirk's Escape Confirmed

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Rance and the Ranch Owner's story, showing Rance's recovery, their emotional reconciliation, and a marriage proposal, resolving their romantic arc.

narrative_arcs.title: Clearing Chris's Name and Woman's Forgiveness

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Dirk's Unexpected Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the lead-up to the wedding, the bride's lingering fears, and the dramatic interruption by Dirk, creating a final moment of suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Lingering Fear
Confrontation and Clarification at the Wedding
